rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes marketing changes and future conditions using neutral language.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Quotes about signs and future return to free-range, neutral facts.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a communication measure ('supermarkets will put up signs') and a future possibility ('When the measures are lifted, eggs will go back to being free-range').
